games.name: Gartic Phone
games.description: A collection of small drawing games that mix Pictionary with the Telephone game!

games.name: skribbl.io
games.description: skribblio is a free multiplayer drawing and guessing game. Draw and guess words with your friends and people all around the world!

games.name: Codewords
games.description: The objective of the game is for the spymasters to send clues to their field operatives (the other players on their team) to help them decode all of their team's words without uncovering the bomb. The team that decodes all of their words first wins; if a team uncovers the bomb, the other team wins.

games.name: Pretend You're Xyzzy
games.description: Cards Against Humanity is a fill-in-the-blank party game that turns your awkward personality and lackluster social skills into hours of fun!

games.name: Picture Cards Online
games.description: Cards Against Humanity is a fill-in-the-blank party game that turns your awkward personality and lackluster social skills into hours of fun! And now with pictures!

games.name: YouTube Secret Stash
games.description: Explore the weird side of YouTube and guess the name of the video!

games.name: Geoguessr
games.description: GeoGuessr is a geography game which takes you on a journey around the world and challenges your ability to recognize your surroundings.

games.name: Scattergories
games.description: An online version of Scattergories - race against the clock to fill a list of categories with words beginning with a certain letter.

games.name: Codenames
games.description: Two teams compete to see who can make contact with all of their agents first, through hinting their codenames.

games.name: vote's out!
games.description: Similar to Quiplash, answer the prompt with your funniest answers to win votes from other players.

games.name: Longwave
games.description: A web adaptation of the social guessing game Wavelength - the Psychic provides a clue that indicates a location on a spectrum of two opposing binaries. Their team then rotates a dial across the spectrum based on that clue, finishing as close to the target as possible!

games.name: Coup Online
games.description: An online version of the game Coup - each turn, play an action based on the cards you have, bluffing to your friends to be the last one standing!

games.name: Spyfall
games.description: Try and find the enemy spy among your group! Each round, all players except the spy will be given a location. The spy must figure out the location to fit in and not get caught!

games.name: Squabble
games.description: A competitive version of Wordle - keep guessing words until you're the last one standing!
